Welcome to the **LLM Project Dashboard**. This page provides a high-level overview of system status and resource consumption.

## Current Status

### üí∞ Today's Spend
```{r spend-today, echo=FALSE}
if (!is.null(daily_data) && nrow(daily_data) > 0) {
  today_cost <- daily_data |> 
    filter(date == max(date)) |> 
    summarise(cost = sum(totalCost)) |> 
    pull(cost)
  cat("#### ", dollar(today_cost))
} else {
  cat("#### No data")
}
```
:::

::: {.g-col-4}
### üìä Weekly Trend
```{r weekly-spend, echo=FALSE}
if (!is.null(daily_data) && nrow(daily_data) > 0) {
  weekly_cost <- daily_data |> 
    filter(as.Date(date) > Sys.Date() - 7) |> 
    summarise(cost = sum(totalCost)) |> 
    pull(cost)
  cat("#### ", dollar(weekly_cost))
} else {
  cat("#### No data")
}
```
:::
